snippet: Newt Gingrich focused on the next Republican battleground, Illinois, and made no mention of ending his campaign anytime soon.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Newt Gingrich heads to Illinois, day after losing two critical Southern primaries; makes no mention about ending his campaign anytime soon.

byline.original: By STEVEN YACCINO and TRIP GABRIEL
byline.contributor: Steven Yaccino reported from Rosemont, and Trip Gabriel from Birmingham, Ala.

lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich focused on the next Republican battleground, Illinois, and made no mention of ending his campaign anytime soon.

headline.seo: Despite Losses, Gingrich Sticks to Same Refrain
headline.main: Despite Losses, Sticking to a Refrain
headline.print_headline: Rivals Regroup for the Next Stretch After 2 Southern Primaries: Despite Losses, Sticking to a Refrain
